text: I believe the initial change was that you couldn't create new JSON cards but that this is the second stage, where any JSON cards would have to be migrated to React to keep on functioning.

Finally, I found that the issue is with the portal (the test extension doesn't work with the production portal or any other sandbox created from the same portal). I tried the test extension on another portal and it worked fine. What would be the best action course to solve this: contact support or?
Is the portal enrolled in the beta?
And they have sales/service hub enterprise
Really got nothing at this point. Lol
yeah, has to be something on HubSpot's end specific to this portal
Panel is in the `coreComponents` file if the latest package version <https://www.npmjs.com/package/@HubSpot/ui-extensions?activeTab=code>
try `npm i @HubSpot/ui-extensions@latest` or set the version to `0.8.10` and do an npm install + project upload
I have followed this process again (this appears to be the same process recommended and pictured above already in the thread) and continue to receive the same error.
do you have more than one package-lock?

Hmm, I had previously deleted them multiple times (as above). I just did so again with a recording to send and now it works :melting_face:
Well thank you guys :crossed_fingers::skin-tone-2:
